item.description:
I'm so sorry, I scheduled this for Oct 3rd by mistake but there looks like a good size group going. Maybe you all want to switch to the following weekend, maybe not. Either way here is a second meetup and this is the one that Pamtastic will be escaping to.


For those of us heading from Dover, let's plan to meet at the high school at 11am.
It's a 44minute drive to Newburyport, and we're never ontime.

SO for those meeting the group in Newburyport, let's say Noon at Jewel in the Crown, Which is across the street from the yarn shop.


The Shop address is 31R Pleasant Street, Newburyport, Massachusetts 01950
If you want to just meet at the shop, I'd go for 1:20 at the shop.

Loom With a View...
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~


Alpaca, Angora, Bamboo, Cashmere, Cotton, Merino, Mohair,
Silk, Soy, Tencel, Wool, and blends galore!

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

Araucania, Blue Sky Alpaca, Cherry Tree Hill, Classic Elite, Debbie Bliss, Ella Rae, Elsebeth Lavold, Fiber Trends, Harrisville Designs, J-Knits, Louet, Malabrigo, NORO, Fiber Trends, Jo Sharp, Mirasol Project, Reynolds, Rowan, Schaefer, Valley Yarns and many more.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

Contact Information
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
31R Pleasant Street, Newburyport, Massachusetts 01950
978.463.YARN (9276)
item.name: Run away to a Loom with a View Take 2
